item.title: Trump Needs an AG Who Is Not His Personal Lawyer
item.description: Before diving into another fiasco reminiscent of the Matt Gaetz nomination, he and his transition team need to think this through carefully.

item.title: Sanction the Disgraceful ICC
item.description: Issuing arrest warrants against Israeli leaders for their just war against Hamas is a moral abomination from an illegitimate body.

item.title: How Trump Can Release Biden’s Regulatory Brake
item.description: Here are some actions the president can take in his first week in office to kickstart deregulatory efforts.

item.title: Pete Hegseth Is Right for the DOD
item.description: If the U.S. military wants to maintain its standing with the American people, its leadership needs to display some moral courage.

item.title: The GOP’s New Coalition Requires a New Economic Agenda
item.description: Help the needy, not the greedy, as a wise man once argued.
